displayName.english: Have You Ever Seen The Rain

description.english: Defeat Death as the Deprived while having at least 10 curse.
Fully repair the Broken Hero Sword.
Sell a combined total worth of 500G to the pawn shop.
Defeat Death as the Doppelganger while having completed every floor with a different form. (10 Total Forms)
Defeat Death without using any Mastery Perks.
Reach a Cinder sum streak of 32 or higher.
Survive a fight against Death at 1 heart or less.
Take a sip from your health flask.
Stay over night at the tavern.

Open a Treasure Chest while having at least +5 Magic Find.

displayName.english: Heaven Is a Place on Earth

Complete the world objective "A New Dawn".
Complete the world objective "Echoes of the Forgotten".

displayName.english: Everybody Wants to Rule the World

Defeat all the world 2 floor 9 bosses.

displayName.english: If You Want Blood (You've Got It)

description.english: Defeat Death while having at least 5 different booze buffs active.

displayName.english: Hit Me With Your Best Shot
